Package com.petpet.c3po.dao.mongo

This package contains all classes needed for the Mongo Persistence Layer.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MongoModelDeserializer Deserializes the given object into a model object.
MongoModelSerializer A simple interface for serializing objects into Mongo DBObjects.
 

Class Summary
MongoActionLogDeserializer Deserializes DBObjects to ActionLog objects.
MongoActionLogSerializer Serializes an ActionLog object to a mongo DBObject.
MongoElementDeserialzer Deserializes DBObjects into Element objects.
MongoElementSerializer Serializes Elements into DBObjects.
MongoFilterSerializer The MongoFilterSerializer translates a filter object to a DBObject query, so that the dataset is first filtered and then the persistence layer function is applied.
MongoIterator<E extends Model> Wraps a Mongo DBCursor into an iterator.
MongoPersistenceLayer A MongoDB (http://www.mongodb.org) specific back-end persistence layer implementation.
MongoPropertyDeserialzer Deserializes the mongo DBObject into a Property object.
MongoPropertySerializer Serializes a Property object to a mongo DBObject.
MongoSourceDeserializer  
MongoSourceSerializer Serializes Source objects to a Mongo DBObject.
 

Package com.petpet.c3po.dao.mongo Description

This package contains all classes needed for the Mongo Persistence Layer.
